name: Duck Quest (Gatchel_Ryan)
description:
This was created for a game jam between a friend and I. The theme was "out of control and we also had to do these things

  • 6 scenes
  • have it done by the 30th
  • us GB Studio https://www.gbstudio.dev/

The point of the game is your friends ducks got loose and are out of control. She wants you to help track them down and find them. I used these assets from other itch pages.

  • https://materialfuture.itch.io/gameboy-assets
  • https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-sprites-16x16
  • https://petermilko.itch.io/pixel-petes-art-assets

If you want to find me on YouTube I'm here https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcVTIWxAecDDs1yNL5-RTNA

I hope you enjoy this short game :)
